summary: The concept of "sustainable marketing," commonly referred to as "green marketing," encompasses strategies aimed at promoting products and services in an environmentally responsible manner. In the context of EU legal and regulatory frameworks, sustainable marketing aligns with directives focused on consumer protection, environmental sustainability, and corporate social responsibility. The EU encourages businesses to adopt green marketing practices to enhance transparency and foster consumer trust. This redirect to "green marketing" highlights the emphasis on eco-friendly initiatives within marketing strategies, reflecting the EU's commitment to sustainability and the promotion of a circular economy, thereby ensuring compliance with relevant regulations.
